meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a fox.
meanings.sent1: The forest was home to many vulpine creatures with bushy tails.
meanings.sent2: The vulpine features of the animal made it easy to mistake it for a fox.
meanings.sent3: The vulpine thief outsmarted everyone by sneaking through the back door.
meanings.sent4: Her vulpine smile hinted at a hidden agenda beneath her friendly demeanor.
meanings.sent5: The vulpine eyes of the cunning fox glinted in the moonlight as it stalked its prey.

meanings.sent1: The vulpine trickster managed to outwit his opponents with ease.
meanings.sent2: She had a vulpine ability to manipulate situations to her advantage.
meanings.sent3: The vulpine con artist convinced everyone to buy his fake potions.
meanings.sent4: His vulpine mind was always scheming, looking for the next opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The vulpine politician used clever tactics to win over the crowd during the debate.
